markdownRemark.html: Based between San Pedro de Alcantara and Estepona, this language school specialises in Spanish lessons that are - made to measure. By taking private Spanish lessons with Habla Español you are assured of learning Spanish at a pace that suits you. Habla Espanol offers group lessons and private lessons.
